group_1.textLeft: Today’s finally the “All Gods Festival” we’ve been @waiting for!

group_1.textRight: I’m really looking forward to attending with @everyone!

group_1.textLeft: The entire city’s going to be in a festive mood. @I wonder what it’ll be like.

group_1.textRight: This is the first time you two will be here for the @All Gods Festival, huh? You’ll be left dumbfounded @anywhere you turn.
Of course there’ll be street vendors lined up everywhere in various parks and shrines,
stores running promotions in the shopping and business districts,
and then there’s a special stage plus other events @being hosted.

group_1.textLeft: Wow!
...I also went many times, when I was still a kid...
The shopping district’s art studio would host trial classes… I had a lot of fun with them…

group_1.textRight: I’d get 1000 yen to spend,
but every store looked like they had tasty food, @so it’d immediately run out!
But neither the attractions nor the stands are @the main highlight of the All Gods Festival!

group_1.textLeft: Whoa, when did you get here, Tsuruno-chan!?

group_1.textRight: Sorry to interrupt!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, that’s right. The main feature is the @fireworks show, right?

group_1.textRight: Correct. It wouldn’t be an exaggeration to say
that this fireworks show is what gave birth to @the All Gods Festival.

group_1.textLeft: I guess Kamihama’s fireworks show will definitely @be really pretty.

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* How naive, Ui-chan.
“Pretty” doesn’t even *begin* to describe the @All Gods Festival’s fireworks show.

group_1.textLeft: Is there something special about it…?

group_1.textRight: The last firework of the show is an @extra-humongous sphere.
As long as you see that gigantic firework,
you’ll be healthy and have a peaceful year @the next year!

group_1.textLeft: Ooh, I see!
So there’s that type of blessing, huh.

group_1.textRight: The atmosphere of everything going on in the @festival should be understandable now.
And when it comes to the fireworks show, @can’t forget that craftsman geezer!

group_1.textLeft: Is he a pretty famous craftsman?

group_1.textRight: He gets extreme stage fright!

group_1.textLeft: Extreme… stage fright…

group_1.textRight: These past few years, he's been the face of the @fireworks show during the online broadcast.
His demeanor in those interviews made him @famous.
It’s hard to watch when he’s really nervous…

group_1.textLeft: *Sigh…* It’d be best if it succeeds without a hitch...

group_1.textRight: It seems some people just can’t get enough of @seeing his nerves though!
Well, I hope it goes well.
If all the Kamihama magical girls could live in @good health and harmoniously…

group_1.textLeft: Ui… You’re right.
Maybe I should send a message to everyone
asking them to watch the fireworks together.

group_1.textRight: Okay, let’s do that!
Ah… But can we find a place for everyone…?
There’s so many Kamihama magical girls…

group_1.textLeft: ...T-That’s true. That might be a problem...

group_1.textRight: It might be too late also…?

group_1.textLeft: Hm?

group_1.textRight: Oh, mine too.
Same for me!

group_1.textLeft: A text message for everyone…?

group_1.textRight: Ah, it’s from Mitama-san.
